originalText.plaidHtml: This movie is an total blockbuster. Love the way the characters play their role, the locations made with such details, gore handled perfectly and sickass music. Honestly this type of portrayal of Pakistan was what needed by bollywood. The YRF Spy universe got it so wrong with their 'connections'. Dhurandhar is a start of an actual spy universe.

That movie was quite enjoyable; it held my attention throughout its entirety. That is precisely the kind of cinematic experience one hopes for.

That movie was quite enjoyable; it held my attention throughout its entirety. That is precisely the kind of cinematic experience one hopes for.

That movie was quite enjoyable; it held my attention throughout its entirety. That is precisely the kind of cinematic experience one hopes for.

summary.originalText: When the Stakes Are High and the Stars Higher

originalText.plaidHtml: Dhurandhar stands out as one of the finest films of the year, showcasing exceptional direction and a powerhouse cast. The lead's performance is both commanding and vulnerable, making the character deeply relatable despite the high-stakes environment. Supporting actors add depth and emotional weight, making every subplot meaningful. The director demonstrates remarkable vision, orchestrating a story that intertwines politics, crime, and personal ambition with razor-sharp precision. The action sequences are choreographed meticulously, enhancing the intensity of the plot rather than serving as mere spectacle. What makes the film truly remarkable is its attention to detail-from lighting to camera angles, each scene reinforces the tone of tension, intrigue, and drama. The screenplay also smartly incorporates real-world events, giving the story credibility and urgency. This film is a rare combination of intelligent writing, expert direction, and unforgettable performances.

Gem of india. A fictional narrative inspired by true incidents, Aditya Dhar's action drama follows Hamza (Ranveer Singh), a mysterious Indian agent who embeds himself deep within Karachi's mafia network (Lyari gangwar) to dismantle terror operations from the inside. Structured across multiple chapters, the world-building is deliberate and immersive, pulling you into a gritty, violent universe that unfolds over nearly 3.5 hours. Yet, the runtime rarely feels overbearing thanks to Dhar's stylish, tight storytelling.

Very well made movie. Great soundtracks beautifully integrated into the movie without breaking the pace. Great pace to the movie, never felt that it was 3+ hrs, great editing, brilliant script, great acting, very well directed. One of the best Hindi movies I've seen in a long time. The quality is easily equal to any well made Hollywood movie. Kudos to the whole team.

summary.originalText: No way you can miss this

originalText.plaidHtml:
Seriously, if you want to boost up your mood and watch something really good you should go. Any actor doing bad acting - NOOOO Like really really well directed and good some scenes just stick to your mind.

A really good movie, bollywood is getting back in form. I don't have any more words to describe it's goodness just go.

Great story, phenomenal performance . Yes it's true that run time of this film is high but trust me you will not get bored. Fully entertainment.sometimes you will be surprised,sometimes you will feel that emotion and anger of the ranvir singh's character. Belive me you will get goosebumps while watching this masterpiece.

The film grips you from the very first frame, gradually immersing you into a world where danger and strategy intertwine seamlessly. Ranveer Singh delivers a powerhouse performance, embodying Hamza with a perfect mix of vulnerability and calculated courage. Director Dhar's vision shines through every sequence, especially in action set pieces that are meticulously choreographed yet emotionally resonant. The cinematography captures both the chaotic streets and tense interiors with equal artistry. Every supporting actor contributes depth, making the criminal underworld feel terrifyingly real. The score heightens suspense without overshadowing the story, and the second half explodes with intensity, leaving you breathless. This is cinema that demands attention, thought, and emotional investment.

summary.originalText: A Masterclass in the Spy Genre - Fact Meets Fiction Perfectly

originalText.plaidHtml: This film stands as a benchmark for the spy genre. It masterfully integrates authentic historical context with a compelling fictional plot, creating a seamless blend of realism and storytelling. We need more cinema like this. In an era of escapism, there is something deeply rewarding about a film that respects the intelligence of its audience. It proves that the most gripping stories aren't found in fantasy, but in the reimagined corners of our own history.

Greatest movie in many years , no bikini, no female Showoff, only nationalism, power pack acting by every cast special love for akshay khana sir.

Big thanks to @adityadhar sir making such beautiful and truth telling movie. Mentality of terrorists are clearly shown and what True army men can do was shown greatly.

summary.originalText: Big Screen Action with Powerful Acting

originalText.plaidHtml: Every frame of the film is meticulously crafted, blending realism, tension, and cinematic spectacle. Ranveer Singh delivers an extraordinary performance, his eyes, posture, and dialogue conveying a nuanced internal struggle while driving the story forward with intensity. Sanjay Dutt's gravitas dominates, making each of his appearances unforgettable, while Akshaye Khanna and R Madhavan anchor the ensemble with measured, intelligent performances that reveal the stakes of the story without unnecessary drama. Arjun Rampal's menacing calm maintains a continuous tension, contrasting sharply with Sara Arjun's emotional vulnerability, which humanizes the larger narrative. Director Aditya Dhar choreographs action sequences, suspenseful confrontations, and narrative twists with precision, ensuring that the story remains taut and engaging. Cinematography captures the beauty and brutality of the underworld, while the musical score enhances suspense and emotional beats alike. By the climax, the film delivers both adrenaline-fueled thrills and profound emotional satisfaction.

This movie is a blockbuster! You won't be able to get over it - you'll want to watch it again and again.

Maddy looked unrecognisable and played the role so gracefully.

Akshaye Khanna added a layer of charm to the character of Rehman Dakait Sanjay Dutt's entry to exit as SP was so charismatic Ranveer Singh my oh my - his character walked so Rahman Dakait ran. He made Rahman shine but him as Hamza was everything - Ghatak, Emotional, Charisma, the realistic spy!

This movie is absolutely fantastic and full of raw information without any sugarcoat. I'm loving it. The acting skills are simply topnotch and seems realistic. It just ripped out the mask of terror sympathisers. I personally highly recommend it and especially a humble request to director that make these type of movies more. üòäüòäüòä

Dhaasoo Movie...Movie is Based on true events.

Good Direction by Aditya Dhar.

Pace of movie is good and no boring moment in movie. I like these type of No nonsense straight to the point movies.

A must watch by Everyone. Please watch this masterpiece in Theaters to get goosebumps feeling. Full Paisa Wasool movie. Eagerly waiting for next part.

It is honestly not your typical spy movie - and that's exactly what makes it special. Every character feels like they have their own story, purpose, and depth, which keeps you hooked throughout. The director has done a fantastic job weaving all these threads together with excellent screenplay, pacing, and action sequences.

The action is crisp, stylish, and never overdone. The storytelling is tight and leaves you thinking long after the movie ends. Truly, what a piece of art.

The only area that could have been better is the music - a good music would've elevated the emotional beats even more.like It is good but it feels lacking to me.

Still, this film won me over completely. I loved it.

If you know, you know - Dhurander is something special.

Dhurandhar is a thoroughly engaging and gripping experience that keeps you hooked from start to finish. From the very first scene, the film draws you into its world with a strong narrative grip, and it never really lets go. Every minute of the movie feels purposeful, intense, and thoughtfully crafted, making it an experience that is not just entertaining but also deeply satisfying.

One of the strongest aspects of Dhurandhar is its storytelling. The pacing is tight, the emotions feel authentic, and the tension is sustained beautifully throughout the film. There are no dull moments, and the screenplay keeps unfolding in ways that constantly hold your attention. It's the kind of movie where you feel fully immersed, losing track of time because of how involved you are in the story.

The performances deserve special appreciation. Everyone in the cast did an amazing job, bringing depth and conviction to their characters. Each actor fits perfectly into the narrative, and their performances feel natural, powerful, and believable. The chemistry between characters adds another layer of strength to the film, making the emotional moments hit harder and the intense scenes feel even more impactful.

Aditya Dhar absolutely nailed it with Dhurandhar. His direction is confident, sharp, and impactful, clearly reflecting his strong vision and storytelling skills. The way he balances intensity, emotion, and narrative flow shows his mastery as a filmmaker. Overall, Dhurandhar is a very interesting film that I genuinely enjoyed every minute of. It's a well-made, compelling movie that leaves a lasting impression and stands out as a solid cinematic experience.

summary.originalText: Star Power Amplified with Intense Action

originalText.plaidHtml: The film's world-building is meticulous, drawing audiences into a narrative that feels simultaneously immediate and complex. Ranveer Singh delivers a magnetic central performance, embodying moral ambiguity and relentless determination. Sanjay Dutt's authoritative presence and Akshaye Khanna and R Madhavan's nuanced portrayals elevate the supporting cast. Arjun Rampal and Sara Arjun bring depth to their roles, ensuring every character has stakes. Aditya Dhar's direction is precise, blending calculated suspense with explosive action sequences. The cinematography captures both chaos and reflection, and the score accentuates moments of tension and emotional resonance. Every scene is crafted to contribute meaningfully to the story, creating a cinematic experience that is thrilling, thought-provoking, and unforgettable.

Dhurandhar is easily one of Ranveer Singh's most powerful performances to date. The movie grabs your attention right from the opening scene and keeps you hooked with its gripping storytelling, stylish action, and emotional depth.

The direction is sharp, the screenplay never drags, and every twist lands beautifully. The supporting cast also delivers brilliantly, adding both weight and charm to the narrative. The cinematography is stunning, capturing every action sequence with precision, and the background score elevates the tension and emotion throughout.

What makes Dhurandhar stand out is its heart. Beyond the thrilling action, it tells a meaningful story about duty, sacrifice, and standing up for what's right. The climax is impactful and leaves you genuinely satisfied.

Overall, Dhurandhar is a must-watch entertainer - stylish, emotional, and driven by an unforgettable performance from Ranveer Singh. A true crowd-pleaser and definitely one of the strongest films of the year!

summary.originalText: Amazing, gripping and fun to watch

originalText.plaidHtml: This movie has been one of the best watches of this year. It is finally a piece worth watching from Bollywood. The screenplay is just great with actual action scenes and the background environment seems legit. The story is gripping and actually catches your attention for 3 1/2 hours. I could have not imagined to sit through a movie this long, but I just couldn't move from my seat when I watched it, the casting is just amazing with Arjun Rampal and Akshay Khanna being perfect for their roles. Thanks, Bollywood. Finally, something I can be proud of.

What a movie. Akshay khanna s deadly performance , Madhvan s intense dialogue delivery , Ranveer s screen presence and ofcourse the terrific direction made this movie a theatrical Festival.

I never thought of a man looking dashing in long hair.

Not a single moment of boredom ... Well done Aditya Dhar üëåüëåüëå U NAILED IT !!

summary.originalText: Holy ducking duck, this is gripping

originalText.plaidHtml:
Acting, filmography, set locations, storytelling, editing, all come together to become a masterpiece.

Ranveer is good, and this may be his best role yet, however the on screen aura projected by Akshaye Khanna is unparalleled. The villain of this story is the real protagonist.

Yes there is gore and blood, but it is not unwanted.

The way the characters and script stand out, shows how much time and effort has been put into every little detail. Incredible acting from all the actors and incredible direction, everyone shines through. Filled with action scenes which leaves you with a rush of adrenaline as you are exiting the movie hall.

Simply great. The movie excels in all aspects. The actors have done justice to their characters no matter how small their appearance maybe. The background score is great. The runtime is long but it never feels stretched. The set design, the action sequences are done remarkably well and the direction, screenplay is outstanding. There is nothing bad to say about the movie. If the story is good and there are no un necessary subplots, I don't mind seating for even 4 hours. More of these kind of movies need to be made in bollywood. Can't wait for the second part.

Just watched Dhurandhar & it is absolutely mind-blowing theatrical experience. What did you create Aditya Dhar, yeh dil maange more!! Brilliant casting, pulsating background score & stellar performances- Ranveer Singh sizzles! The momentum never drops, the film is so engaging that 3.5 hrs fly by, an absolute watch, if this movie doesn't ignite the patriotism in you, then nothing will, Dhurandhar isn't just a film- it's a statement!!

summary.originalText: One of the Best Bollywood Movie - " Dhurandhar "

originalText.plaidHtml:
When the Leader of a project works hard along with the entire crew, the result is always exceptional. Director Aditya Dhar has proved this once again.

Dhurandhar is one of the best Indian movies ever made and surely one of the finest espionage films in Bollywood. The movie has an excellent screenplay, powerful action sequences, stunning cinematography, and outstanding performances by the entire cast-especially Ranveer Singh, Akshaye Khanna, Arjun Rampal, Rakesh Bedi, Danish Pandor, Sanjay Dutt, R. Madhavan, and Sara Arjun. Special credit also goes to editor Shivkumar Panicker.

Above all, Aditya Dhar deserves huge appreciation. After Uri: The Surgical Strike and Article 370, he has once again broken his own records. With Dhurandhar, he has set a new benchmark and raised the standard of Indian cinema.

This movie is a must-watch for everyone. It shows the harsh reality of the Pakistani government-how it oppresses and manipulates its own citizens and promotes terrorism against India. It also highlights the sacrifices of RAW agents, who give their lives and souls for the motherland, and exposes how some corrupt Indian politicians sell their conscience and compromise the nation's integrity.

A powerful, bold, and unforgettable film. üáÆüá≥üé¨
